title: Gods appearing for the tribe of Levi: improved in a sermon preached at St. Paul's, Nov. 8. to the sons of ministers, then solemnly assembled. / By Geo: Hall, minster at St. Botolph Aldersgate.
author: Hall, George, 1612?-1668.
publisher: Printed by Tho: Roycroft, for Philemon Stephens, at the gilded Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: The title page is in the same setting as that of the 28-page edition.
